changelog:
Alpha 2 – Polish, Fixes & Improved User Experience

   This is the second alpha release of the 21.609.78 update, focusing on improving stability, fixing UI issues, and enhancing usability based on user feedback.

⦁ Improved :
 ▫ Update checking for Myanmar users — no longer requires VPN to check for updates.

⦁ Fixed :
 ▫ Status bar icon visibility in dark theme — fixed black icons on some devices for better contrast.

⦁ Removed :
 ▫ Developer contact buttons from the drawer (TikTok, YouTube, Sketchub, Telegram) to simplify the UI.
 ▫ Lottie animation from SearchView empty state — replaced with a static image for cleaner UI.
